description: The best Thanksgiving cocktails are the ones that remind you of being home with your family. You can't get any more comforting than sitting by a fire, drinking freshly-squeezed&nbsp;lemonade, and eating&nbsp;pumpkin pie.This Harvest Margarita is perfect for this time of year because it mimics these flavors while still feeling festive enough to enjoy on Thanksgiving day!
name: Harvest Margarita
recipeIngredient: 1 ½ oz. Chilled spiced simple syrup
½ oz. Freshly squeezed lime juice

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the tequila, simple syrup, lime juice, bitters, and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake for 10 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the tequila, simple syrup, lime juice, bitters, and ice in a cocktail shaker and shake for 10 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Serve straight up or on the rocks with a lime wedge for garnish.
recipeInstructions.text: Serve straight up or on the rocks with a lime wedge for garnish.
